biotools.summary: PAICE (Pathway Analysis and Integrated Coloring of Experiments) is a rapid bioinformatics pathway visualization tool for KEGG-compatible accessions derived from Illumina Solexa next-gen and Affymetrix datasets. It colors KEGG pathways while appreciating detection-calls and duplicate gene copies.
